  • Constructor Details

    • AccommodationAlertFacade

      public AccommodationAlertFacade()
      Default constructor for creating an `AccommodationAlertFacade` instance. It initializes the DAO factory and sets the current accommodation to null.

    • insertAccommodationAlert

      public void insertAccommodationAlert (int profileID, String location, float surface, float minPrice, float maxPrice)
      Inserts a new accommodationAlert with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      profileID - The ID of the profile.
      location - The location of the accommodationAlert.
      surface - The surface of the accommodationAlert.
      minPrice - The minimum price of the accommodationAlert.
      maxPrice - The maximum price of the accommodationAlert.

    • updateAccommodationAlert

      public void updateAccommodationAlert (int id, int profileID, String location, float surface, float minPrice, float maxPrice)

      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the accommodationAlert.
      profileID - The ID of the profile
      location - The location of the accommodationAlert.
      surface - The surface of the accommodationAlert.
      minPrice - The minimum price of the accommodationAlert.
      maxPrice - The maximum price of the accommodationAlert.
